殘.definition: to destroy; to spoil; to ruin; to injure; cruel; oppressive; savage; brutal; incomplete; disabled; to remain; to survive; remnant; surplus

殘兵敗將.definition: ruined army, defeated general (idiom); scattered remnants

殘冬臘月.definition: final days of the lunar year

殘卷.definition: surviving section of a classic work; remaining chapters (while reading a book)

殘垣敗壁.definition: lit. walls reduced to rubble (idiom); fig. scene of devastation; ruins

殘垣斷壁.definition: lit. walls reduced to rubble (idiom); fig. scene of devastation; ruins

殘奧.definition: Paralympics; same as Paralympic Games 殘奧會|残奥会[Can2 Ao4 hui4]

殘害.definition: to injure; to devastate; to slaughter

殘局.definition: endgame (in chess); desperate situation; aftermath (of a failure)

殘年短景.definition: at the end of the year (idiom)

殘念.definition: (coll.) to regret; what a pity! (loanword from Japanese "zannen")

殘民害物.definition: to harm people and damage property (idiom)

殘渣.definition: remainder; filtered out residue; sediment; waste product; debris; detritus; rubbish

殘渣餘孽.definition: evil elements who have escaped eradication

殘留.definition: to remain; to be left over; residual; remnant; residue

殘疾.definition: disabled; handicapped; deformity on a person or animal

殘疾兒.definition: a child with a birth defect; a deformed child

殘羹剩飯.definition: leftovers from a meal; fig. remnants handed down from others

殘膜.definition: leftover agricultural plastic (as waste or rubbish that needs to be disposed of or recycled)

殘花敗柳.definition: broken flower, withered willow (idiom); fig. fallen woman

殘茶剩飯.definition: spoilt tea, leftover food (idiom); remains after a meal; crumbs from the feast

殘莖.definition: stubble (the stems of plants after harvest)

殘餘.definition: remnant; relic; residue; vestige; surplus; to remain; to leave surplus
